Enums/TrustPinMode.html#/s:11TrustPinKit.name: strict
Enums/TrustPinMode.html#/s:11TrustPinKit.abstract: Strict mode: Enforces certificate pinning validation for all domains.

Enums/TrustPinMode.html#/s:11TrustPinKit.name: permissive
Enums/TrustPinMode.html#/s:11TrustPinKit.abstract: Permissive mode: Allows selective certificate pinning validation.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: invalidProjectConfig
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: The project configuration is invalid or incomplete.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: errorFetchingPinningInfo
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: Failed to fetch or parse pinning information from the remote source.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: invalidServerCert
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: The server certificate is invalid, corrupted, or could not be parsed.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: pinsMismatch
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: No matching pins were found for the provided certificate.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: allPinsExpired
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: All configured pins for the domain have expired.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: configurationValidationFailed
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: The payload failed validation (e.g., signature mismatch or invalid structure).

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: domainNotRegistered
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: The domain is not registered for pinning and enforcement is enabled.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html.name: TrustPinErrors
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html.abstract: Represents possible errors thrown by the TrustPin library.

Enums/TrustPinLogLevel.html.name: TrustPinLogLevel
Enums/TrustPinLogLevel.html.abstract: Represents the severity level of a log message.

Enums/TrustPinMode.html.name: TrustPinMode
Enums/TrustPinMode.html.abstract: Defines the behavior for handling unregistered domains in TrustPin certificate pinning.

Classes/TrustPinURLSessionDelegate.html#.name: urlSession(_:didReceive:)
Classes/TrustPinURLSessionDelegate.html#.abstract: Handles server trust challenges using an asynchronous TrustPin verification.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.name: setup(organizationId:projectId:publicKey:mode:)
Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Initializes the TrustPin core library with the specified configuration.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.name: verify(domain:certificate:)
Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Verifies a certificate against the specified domain using public key pinning.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.name: set(logLevel:)
Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Sets the current log level for TrustPin’s internal logging system.

Classes/TrustPinURLSessionDelegate.html.name: TrustPinURLSessionDelegate
Classes/TrustPinURLSessionDelegate.html.abstract: A URL session delegate that performs server trust evaluation using TrustPin’s verification.
